products.name: Canon EOS 5D Mark IV
products.shortDescription: Professional DSLR camera with 30.4MP full-frame sensor
products.fullDescription: The Canon EOS 5D Mark IV DSLR Camera is a remarkable advancement in image quality, performance and versatility. It features a 30.4MP full-frame CMOS sensor with ISO range 100-32000, expandable up to 50-102400. Dual Pixel CMOS AF technology enables fast and accurate autofocus during live view shooting and video recording. The camera also features 4K video recording at 30 fps, a 61-point AF system, 7 fps continuous shooting, built-in Wi-Fi with NFC, and much more.
products.searchTerms: canon eos 5d mark iv dslr camera professional photography full frame

products.name: Sigma 24-70mm f/2.8 DG OS HSM Art Lens
products.shortDescription: Versatile zoom lens with optical stabilization
products.fullDescription: The Sigma 24-70mm f/2.8 DG OS HSM Art Lens for Canon EF is a versatile zoom lens designed for full-frame Canon EF-mount DSLRs. It features a constant f/2.8 maximum aperture, optical stabilization, and a Hyper Sonic Motor (HSM) for fast and quiet autofocus. The lens also includes three SLD elements and four aspherical elements to minimize aberrations and distortions.
products.searchTerms: sigma 24-70mm f/2.8 dg os hsm art lens canon ef zoom optical stabilization

products.name: Manfrotto Befree Advanced Travel Tripod
products.fullDescription: The Manfrotto Befree Advanced Travel Tripod is a compact and lightweight tripod designed for travel photographers. It features a carbon fiber construction, a maximum height of 59.1 inches, and a load capacity of 17.6 pounds. The tripod also includes a ball head with a quick release plate, a leg angle selector, and a twist lock mechanism for quick and easy setup.
products.searchTerms: manfrotto befree advanced travel tripod compact lightweight

products.name: Lowepro ProTactic 450 AW II Camera Backpack
products.fullDescription: The Lowepro ProTactic 450 AW II Camera Backpack is a durable and spacious backpack designed for professional photographers. It features a customizable interior with padded dividers, a built-in all-weather cover, and multiple access points for quick and easy gear retrieval. The backpack also includes a dedicated laptop compartment, a tripod attachment system, and a removable waist belt for added comfort.
products.searchTerms: lowepro protactic 450 aw ii camera backpack durable spacious
